What are the components of a currency definition in Verus, and what do they represent?

In Verus, a currency definition consists of several components, including:

* `conversions`: an array of pre-launch conversion rates for non-fractional currencies
* `minpreconversion`: an array of minimum amounts required in pre-conversions for a currency to launch
* `currencies`: an array of currencies that can be converted to this currency at launch or make up a liquidity basket
* `currencynames`: an object mapping i-addresses to fully qualified names of all sub-currencies
* `initialsupply`: the initial currency supply for fractional currencies before preallocation or issuance
* `prelaunchcarveout`: the pre-launch percentage of proceeds for fractional currency sent to the launching ID
* `preallocations`: an array of VerusIDs and amounts for pre-allocation at launch
* `initialcontributions`: an array of amounts of pre-conversions reserved for the launching ID
* `idregistrationfees`: the base cost of IDs for this currency namespace in this currency
* `idreferrallevels`: the levels of ID referrals (only for native PBaaS chains and IDs)
* `idimportfees`: the fees required to import an ID to this system (only for native PBaaS chains and IDs)
* `eras`: an array of objects representing different chain phases of rewards and convertibility, including reward start, decay, halving, and era end.

These components define the properties and behavior of a currency in Verus.

rrency weights (only returned for a liquidity basket)
  "conversions" : "[n, ...]",      (numberarray) pre-launch conversion rates for non-fractional currencies
  "minpreconversion" : "[n, ...]",    (numberarray) minimum amounts required in pre-conversions for currency to launch
  "currencies" : "["i-address", ...]", (stringarray) currencies that can be converted to this currency at launch or makeup a liquidity basket
  "currencynames" : "{"i-address":"fullname",...}", (obj) i-addresses mapped to fully qualified names of all sub-currencies
  "initialsupply" : n,           (number) initial currency supply for fractional currencies before preallocation or issuance
  "prelaunchcarveout" : n,         (number) pre-launch percentage of proceeds for fractional currency sent to launching ID
  "preallocations" : "[{"i-address":n}, ...]", (objarray) VerusIDs and amounts for pre-allocation at launch
  "initialcontributions" : "[n, ...]",  (numberarray) amounts of pre-conversions reserved for launching ID
  "idregistrationfees" : n,        (number) base cost of IDs for this currency namespace in this currency
  "idreferrallevels" : n,         (int) levels of ID referrals (only for native PBaaS chains and IDs)
  "idimportfees" : n,           (number) fees required to import an ID to this system (only for native PBaaS chains and IDs)
  "eras" : "[obj, ...]",         (objarray) different chain phases of rewards and convertibility
  {
   "reward" : "[n, ...]",        (int) reward start for each era in native coin
   "decay" : "[n, ...]",        (int) exponential or linear decay of rewards during each era
   "halving" : "[n, ...]",       (int) blocks between halvings during each era
   "eraend" : "[n, ...]",        (int) block marking the end of each era
